name: Persian
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fasten Claws
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage.
